faq_items.question: How does Docsie help Safety and Compliance Officers manage version control for frequently updated safety protocols?
faq_items.answer: Docsie provides robust version control that tracks document revisions and ensures only the most up-to-date safety protocols are accessible to users. The platform maintains a detailed audit trail of all document changes, which is invaluable for regulatory audits and demonstrating compliance with current safety standards.
